Info.Title: Mission: Impossible II
Info.Writer: Bruce Geller (creator television series Mission: Impossible), Ronald D. Moore (story), Brannon Braga (story), Robert Towne (screenplay)
Info.Actors: Tom Cruise, Dougray Scott, Thandie Newton, Ving Rhames
Info.Plot: I.M.F. Agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney, Australia to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".
